column8: georgia passed away on tuesday evening
column13: the son of the late george teague
column14: sr. and the late emma whitman teague. he was retired from douglas & lomason
column16: and was a member of harmony baptist church. in addition to his parents
column17: he was preceded in death by sisters: dot fox and gladys nolan. survivors include his wife
column19: gerylen alewine teague; daughter and son-in-law: sheila & steve harris of whitesburg; sons and daughters-in-law: keith & jeanette teague of jacksonville
column20: florida and ken & tanya teague of carrollton; sister
column22: larry teague of bremen; grandchildren: jessica teague
column24: and joshua teague; and two great grandchildren: blaze mc. donald and phoenix mc. donald. funeral services will be conducted friday
column26: 2015 at 2:00 pm from martin & hightower heritage chapel with rev. anthony puckett and rev. john whetstone officiating. those serving as pallbearers will be scott flournouy
column31: and anthony smith. interment will follow in carroll memory gardens with rev. mike harris officiating. the family will receive friends at the funeral home on thursday evening from 4:00 pm until 8:00 pm. messages of condolence may be sent to the family at www. martin-hightower. com. martin & hightower heritage chapel has charge of the arrangements.
